name: Borneo Cultures Museum
description: Malaysia’s largest museum, showcasing Sarawak’s rich cultural heritage and indigenous artifacts.
address: Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, 93400 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

name: Sarawak Cultural Village
description: A 'Living Museum' with authentic longhouses and cultural performances representing Sarawak's ethnic groups.

name: Kuching Cat Museum
description: Celebrates Kuching's feline identity with over 4,000 cat-related exhibits.
address: Bangunan DBKU, Jalan Semariang, Petra Jaya, 93050 Kuching, Sarawak

name: Semenggoh Wildlife Centre
description: A rehabilitation center for semi-wild orangutans, best visited during feeding times.
address: Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, 93250 Kuching, Sarawak

name: Jong's Crocodile Farm and Zoo
description: Malaysia’s largest crocodile farm, also home to other animals and exhibits.
